resources.string:
Agus Wahyu Setiawan
Jefanya Givenfirsta
Ravica Hayati
Muhammad Bayu Permana Putra
Nara Bagus Darmawan

In this version, the application will be taken from Mahabharata Epic, and there are two characters to pick, which are Yudhistira and Duryudhana. Now, do you love to be a hero like Yudhistira, or do you want to understand how villain like Duryudhana works out?
Hi, Yudistira! As the eldest in Pandawa, you got a message from Duryudana, the leader of Kuru kingdom. The message contained an invitation to have a game of dice in Kuru Kingdom.
With a little hesitation, you arrived at Hastinapura with your brothers and your wives to accept Duryudana\'s invitation.

Now, you\'re inside the game room, where you will going to play a game of dice with him. The people you see on screen are Duryudana and his uncle, Sangkuni. Sangkuni will be the advisor and the dice thrower. What are you going to bet on the first round?
First round has been started! Sangkuni throw the dice...
Duryudana insists by saying \"Hey Yudistira, the leader of Kurujanggala, you must put your bet with me!\". Will you put your bet?
Yudistira, you have lost the first round! \"I\'m losing, it\'s okay, this is just the beginning\"
To continue the game, you must put a higher bet than your weapons and armors. \"Alright, I\'m putting my kingdom\'s wealth for this round!\"

Second round has been started, and the dice has been thrown. However, Yudistira lost again. All the kingdom\'s wealth are falling to Duryudana\'s hand. \"Oh no! I must play another round to take my wealth back!\"
You must be very upset, but your kingdom is the only one\'s left in your disposal. Will you bet your Kingdom, Kurujanggala, this time?

Third round has been started, and the dice has been thrown once again. For the third time, Yudistira lost again. Now Kurujanggala kingdom has fall in Duryudana\'s hands. \"No! Kurujanggala\'s Kingdom now is Duryudana\'s? What should I do?\"
Sangkuni come to your closely and whisper \"Just bet on your beloved Kingdom, Kurujanggala, and Kuru\'s kingdom will be yours if you win.\" Follow Sangkuni\'s advice?

\"It\'s ok, Yudistira. You still have your brothers and your wives. Just put them on your bet, maybe the luck will be yours, this time.\" Duryudana challenged you to put your brothers and wives on the bet. What will you do?
Fourth round has been started, and the dice has been thrown once again. Yudistira lost again for the fourth time and your brothers and wives are in Duryudana\'s hands!
Because you have a very minimum power, you failed to take back what you have bet on before. Drestarasta, Duryudana\'s father, break up the fight and tell Yudistira to go home.
Drestarasta, Duryudana\'s father, feels that there will be a big chaos that will happen to his descendants. He choose to return everything that Yudistira has put a bet on.
Yudistira come back from the punishment he received. Duryudana refused to have peaceful talk.
Come to Kresna to ask for help!
Kresna is sleeping, where you will have your seat?
Arjuna come and sit below Kresna
Arjuna come and sit beside Kresna
Kresna woke up! Tell him you need reinforcements!
"Kresna, a war will happen! I need reinforcmements! Help me!"
But I see Arjuna first! Tell me if you come first!
Well, I see you first rather than Arjuna
I come before Arjuna! Give me reinforcements!
Kresna, give me reinforcements! Big war incoming!
All right, I\'ll help you both. 10000 army or myself for strategy?
All right, I\'ll help you. 10000 army or myself for strategy?
Duryudana loses. He\'s retreating at a cave.
Duryudana asks Kresna for assistance for defeating Pandawa
YES, I\'m putting my weapons and armors.
Reject and take back everything you have bet before.
Take back the wealth you put your bet on from Duryudana.
Go home to Indraprasta with defeat.
You have been kicked out from the game.
You\'re going home with regret and lost.
You\'re failed to take what\'s yours, and you\'re getting kicked from the game.
